question: ऑस्कर अवार्ड 2025 में 'Best Picture' किस फ़िल्म को मिला? / Which film won the 2025 Oscar for Best Picture?
2024–25 डेविस कप (Davis Cup) चैंपियन कौन सी टीम रही? / Which team won the Davis Cup in 2024–25?
2025 Pulitzer पुरस्कार (फिक्शन कैटेगरी) किस पुस्तक को मिला? / Which book won the 2025 Pulitzer Prize for Fiction?
2024 Booker Prize विजेता कौन हैं? / Who won the Booker Prize in 2024?

options.C: Kiran Desai for The Inheritance of Loss

question: 82वें Golden Globe Awards 2025 में 'Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy' किसे मिला? / Which film won Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy at the 2025 Golden Globes?
Thomas Cup 2024 विजेता कौन सी टीम बनी? / Which team won the Thomas Cup in 2024?
Laureus World Sports Awards 2025 में 'Female Athlete of the Year' का पुरस्कार किसने जीता? / Who won the Laureus Female Athlete of the Year award in 2025?
2024 का Ballon d'Or विजेता कौन है? / Who won the 2024 Ballon d'Or?
Dan David Prize 2025 के विजेताओं में से कौन शामिल हैं? / Which of the following were named as winners of the Dan David Prize in 2025?

options.D: सभी के सभी (All of the above)

question: 2025 Grammy Awards में 'Record of the Year' का पुरस्कार किसे मिला? / Who won the 2025 Grammy Award for Record of the Year?
Ramon Magsaysay Award 2024 में निम्नलिखित विजेताओं में से कौन शामिल हैं? / Which of the following were recipients of the Ramon Magsaysay Award in 2024?

options.D: सभी के सभी (All of the above)

question: International Booker Prize 2024 विजेता कौन हैं? / Who won the International Booker Prize in 2024?

options.A: Kairos by Jenny Erpenbeck (translator Michael Hofmann)
options.C: The Loneliness of Sonia and Sunny by Kiran Desai
